nodes.text: Ord Canfre Institute for Ethics in Art Criticism

The Ord Canfre Institute for Ethics in Art Criticism was an Ord Canfre-based school. After retiring from a career in communication arts, Cepa Bonshu, creator of the anti-Imperial propaganda poster What Will You Do, taught at the institute.
The Ord Canfre Institute for Ethics in Art Criticism was mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
